name: 高立人
schedule:
01. computational intelligence (10/3)
02. simulated annealing (10/3)
03. introduction to evolutionary computation (10/3)
04. ant colony system (10/24)
05. particle swarm intelligence (10/24)
06. genetic algorihms (search operators, search schemes, niching, constraint handling (10/24)
07. evolutionary multiobjective optimization (11/7)
08. genetic programming (11/7)
09. evolutionary strategy (11/7) 
10. co-evolution (11/14)
11. artificial immune system (11/14)
12. memetic algorithm (11/14)
13. social based algorithm (12/12)
14. learning classifier systems (12/12)
15. theoretical analysis (12/12)
16. Presentation (12/19, 12/25, 1/8, 1/15)
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments on each subject covered: 30%
Midterm Project: 30%
Final Project: proposal, final report, and oral presentation: 40%
materials:
References:	
Genetic Algorithms in Search, Optimization & Machine Learning, Goldberg, Addison-Wesley, 1989
An Introduction to Genetic Algorithms, Mitchell, MIT, 1996
Ant Colony Optimization, Dorigo and Stutzle, MIT, 2004
Multi-Objective Optimization Using Evolutionary Algorithms, Deb, John Wiley, 2001
